headline: West Ham United Women re-sign Shelina Zadorsky on permanent deal
summary: West Ham United have signed Canadian international centurion Shelina Zadorsky following the expiration of her contract at Tottenham Hotspur. She made ten appearances on loan to the Hammers last season, playing 66 times for Spurs […]

headline: Everton and Liverpool grouped together in Women’s League Cup
summary: The Merseyside rivals are joined in their Women’s League Cup group by Manchester United and Newcastle United. The draw was made live on talkSPORT2’s Social Show and carried out by former England international Lianne Sanderson. […]

headline: Sheffield United Women sign Maria Farrugia
summary: Sheffield United have signed Malta international attacking midfielder Maria Farrugia following her departure from Lewes. The Blades fought off competition from clubs both domestically and overseas to secure the 23-year-old, who has previously enjoyed spells […]

headline: Man City Women sign Naomi Layzell on four-year deal
summary: Manchester City have signed England youth international defender Naomi Layzell from Bristol City on a four-year contract. The 20-year-old was an integral part of Bristol City’s promotion to the WSL in 2022-23 season, playing 20 […]

headline: Three Regional Leagues underway, North West plays again midweek
summary: Three of the eight Regional Leagues kicked off the new season on Sunday, with the North West going again in a full midweek programme. EASTERN – Saints net six at Needham Premier – Haringey Borough […]

headline: Pre-season results feature Arsenal Women win over Washington Spirit

headline: Stirling University and Stenhousemuir secure first wins
summary: Stirling University and Stenhousemuir picked up their first wins of the Barclays Scottish Women’s Championship in the second weekend of the season. Falkirk travelled to Stirling full of confidence after dominating Stenny 4-0 in the […]

headline: Celtic Women edge Glasgow City, Hearts top on goals scored
summary: The ScottishPower Women’s Premier League top five are separated only by goal-difference, Hearts top from Rangers on goals scored with Celtic third. Celtic 1-0 Glasgow City Hearts 5-0 Spartans Hibernian 7-0 Aberdeen Motherwell 3-2 Montrose […]

headline: Promoted Exeter City Women start FAWNL season with big win
summary: FA Women’s National League Southern Premier Division newcomers Exeter City scored seven, Burnley and Rugby Borough both won by even bigger margins. Northern Premier Division Burnley 9-0 Hull City (Att: 164) Halifax 0-10 Rugby Borough […]

headline: Strabane Athletic, Raceview and Civil Service win NIWFA league titles
summary: While Strabane Athletic, Raceview and Civil Service all clinched NIWFA league titles, the Championship still has a few weeks to run. The league’s top two sides, Sion Swifts and St James Swifts, both won to […]
